entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 60%
